text: mulya yuddhaya: dhanawadaye bindawatimehi nawa awadhiyak-loka samajawadi web adawiya mulya yuddhaya: dhanawadaye bindawatimehi nawa awadhiyak nik bims wisini, 2019 agosthu 8 chinaya “mulya gasakanneku” lesa hanwadu gasimata tramp paripalanaya gath thiranaya, 5da bijinaya wisin renminbi mudala tharamak awapramanaya kirimata gath thiranayata prathicharayak wu athara mudala, eksath janapada dolar 1k 7ka mattamata wada pahatha watimata ida dimen eya, eksath janapadaya wisin diyath karanu labana welanda yuddhayen obbata yana bawa angawum karayi.

mese polispathiwarayagen lada upades anuwa kriyathmaka wu mathdrawya karyanshaye adhyakshawaraya ee wana witath mujahid soya meheyumaka nirathawa sitina siya niladharin dasadenaku pamana thaman wetha kandawa polispathiwarayata labi athi amarikanu buddhi sewa thorathura heli karamin jawaramkaruwan kese ho kotu karagatha yuthu bawa owunta sandahan karanuye pawathina barapathala thaththwaya pilibanda dirgha washayen sakachcha karamini.

yuda muktha kalapayakwa, jana shunyawa, wanantharaya wisin gilagath maha kankasanthure nagaraya mage dasata kandulu nanwuwa.kalinga magha wisin wanasana lada maha anuradhapura sanskruthiya wal bihi wi gara watenna aththeth, soli aaka්ramana nisa athhara damanu labu maha polonnaru sanskruthiya wal alinge keli bimak wi wanantharayata dira yannata aththeth me widihatamayi kiyala mata eda hithuna. 13 weni shatha warshayen pala wi ka්ramayen wadi aa yapana sanskruthiya 1990 n mepitata gara watennata patan aran, ada wena wita polowata samathala wemin pawathinawa.kalingha maghalata, aarya chaka්rawarthilata wada ruduru tha්rasthawadiyek wu “pa්rabhakaranla” yapana sanskruthiya wal bihi kota atha.polowata samathala wi dira gos mala ka athi kankasanthure dumriya sthanaya uda mama hita gaththa.
mage dasa desa balanu.
